articles.title: Anderson Cooper: We've entered the 'perfect phone call' phase of the Mar-a-Lago saga - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Anderson Cooper reacts to some of former President Donald Trump's allies' reactions to the FBI's search of Mar-a-Lago.

articles.title: Video: 'Genuinely worried': Why researcher fears Lake Mead could hit dead pool - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Bill Weir talks to Kathryn Sorensen, Director of Research at Arizona State University's Kyl Center for Water Policy, about fears Lake Mead could reach dead pool.

articles.author: Rebekah Riess and Zoe Sottile, CNN
articles.title: Hiker dies after 100-foot fall in Oregon's Columbia River Gorge
articles.description: A woman hiking with a group of friends in the Columbia River Gorge outside Portland, Oregon, died on Friday after falling approximately 100 feet and suffering a head injury, say officials.

articles.author: Laura Studley and Zoe Sottile, CNN
articles.title: Four victims of the McKinney Fire positively identified through DNA and dental analysis
articles.description: Officials have identified four people killed in the McKinney Fire in California as residents of the same community.

articles.author: Nicquel Terry Ellis, CNN
articles.title: Cryptocurrency has been touted as the key to building Black wealth. But critics are skeptical
articles.description: Samson Williams was working in the mortgage lending industry in 2014 when a colleague convinced him to invest in cryptocurrency.

articles.author: Haley Brink
articles.title: 'Prolific rainfall and widespread flash flooding' threaten nearly 10 million people across the Southwest
articles.description: Nearly 10 million people across Arizona, New Mexico and western Texas are under flood watches Saturday, including Phoenix, Albuquerque and El Paso.
articles.content:

articles.author: Natalie Croker, Renée Rigdon, Judson Jones, Carlotta Dotto and Angela Dewan, CNN
articles.title: The world's rivers are drying up from extreme weather. See how 6 look from space
articles.description: To be stuck "up a river without a paddle" is an expression for a sticky situation you just can't get out of. But if that river happens to be in the northern hemisphere this summer, it's likely the paddle won't be helpful, anyway.

articles.author: Dakin Andone
articles.title: Oklahoma, with a history of botched lethal injections, prepares to start executing a man a month
articles.description: Oklahoma will soon begin executing death row inmates at a pace of about one man per month, with plans to put to death 25 prisoners over the next two years despite cries by critics and experts who point not only to outstanding questions of the mental fitness o…

articles.author: Paul Vercammen, CNN
articles.title: Would you rip up your lawn for $6 a square foot? Welcome to drought-stricken California
articles.description: The megadrought affecting the American West has been record-breaking, with no tangible relief in sight. It's forcing cities to crack down on lawn-watering, and paying residents to replace their lawns with drought-resistant plants.

articles.author: Justin Gamble and Virginia Langmaid, CNN
articles.title: Black couple sues after they say home valuation rises nearly $300,000 when shown by White colleague
articles.description: A Maryland couple has sued a local real estate appraiser and an online mortgage loan provider, alleging that the housing appraisal they received was unfairly low due to their race, in violation of the Fair Housing Act, after a second appraisal returned a resu…
